name: Prevense Cleanser
description: All skin types: This new formulation has been specially created to gently cleanse and revive your skin, eliminating dull tired complexions. Removes all traces of make up, dirt & impurities from the face effectively. Even eye make up. Ingredients: Avocado oil, Evening Primrose Oil, Sea Minerals, Pro Vitamin B5.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.*Images for illustration purposes only.
